caption:
Title: BLACK MASK / Steve Rogers x Reader (can be Avengers x Reader)

Summary: Your brother, Tony Stark, arranged a Christmas Masquerade Ball, but things turn upside down.

Pairing: Steve Roger x Female Stark!Reader | Avengers x Reader

Warnings: fighting, violence, blood, implied smut.

Word Count: roughly 1.6k.

Author’s Note: This is my first time writing a fight scene so… Please do comment, ask, or anything regarding this, I do appreciate constructive criticisms as I don’t usually write fics often. I haven’t proofread this yet. I’m sorry.

MASTERLIST

You were in the car, listening to some Christmas songs. You’re on your way to this Christmas Masquerade Ball that your brother, Tony Stark, is holding. You opened your purse and got a mirror, you looked at yourself and smiled, satisfied on how you looked for tonight. “Ms. y/n, we’re here.” Your driver said. “Thank you, Happy.” You smiled and went out of the car. You got inside the venue, looked around and saw how beautifully the place is decorated. “Impressive. This is such a Tony Stark move.” You said and giggled. Tony had rented out a bigger venue for the ball as you quote him, “The tower can’t accommodate all your fancy gowns.”

“Indeed, it is a Tony Stark move.” A random guy wearing a red mask contrasting his blonde hair said. You laughed, and so does the guy. “I’ll see you around, Ms. Black Mask.” The guy said leaving you alone. “And you thought I  wouldn’t notice you, Steve Rogers.” you said to yourself. You walked around, and saw familiar faces. “Boo!” a white masked lady is now beside you. “Stop it, Nat. I know it’s you.” You said to your bestfriend. “God, I thought you wouldn’t even recognize me. I hate you.” Natasha said. “Well, I couldn’t miss the red hair so-” You trailed.

An hour had passed and Steve is still ringing in your head. “Why does he look so fucking good all the time?” you blurt out, sipping in your drink. “Who?” Wanda asked returning on your table. You were startled, “What? It’s nothing.” But knowing your bestfriends, they know very well you’re lying. they looked at you suspiciously. “Fine, fine! I’ll spill!” Natasha and Wanda giggled. “Who is it? We might know him.” “Awhile ago, when I arrived here, a random guy with a red mask talked to me. I was talking to myself but I guess my voice was kind of loud that he heard it and made a small conversation with me.” You said. “Hmm.. is it that guy?” Natasha pointed at your back and saw Steve, talking to Bucky, Sam and Clint. “Unfortunately, it is.” you asked. Wanda smiled. “You’re still into him huh.” Natasha eyed you, “Well, couldn’t really get him out of my mind that easily.” You replied.

“Go after him.” Natasha said. “What? No! Why would I? I told myself I’ll leave him be.” You replied. “y/n, you’re obviously so into him still, and he’s probably too.” Wanda said. “PROBABLY, we’re not sure about it. And besides, he’s got company.” You said, eyeing Steve and a person you recognize easily, Sharon.

“Hello there, ladies.” Tony said walking towards you three. You smiled at Pepper and gave her a hug. “How are you? I haven’t seen you in awhile.” Pepper said to you, which made you sigh. “Well, you can ask my brother to why you haven’t seen me in days.” You replied looking at your brother. “She’s busy. Very busy.” Tony winked at you. Tony and you have agreed on you training to be in the Avengers, but is keeping it a secret for the meantime, as you both don’t know how things will work out once you announce it to them.

It’s that part of the event that everyone’s on their feet and on the dance floor. You were so bored that you went to the bar inside the hotel that the event’s taking place and ordered a drink. “God, can this event finish already? I’m tired.” You said, making the bartender laugh. You were having your second drink when a guy went up to you, “May I have this dance, mi lady?” you looked at him and saw that it was Steve, you smiled. “You’re seriously asking me to dance with you?” he nodded and smiled, taking his hand out for you to reach. You held his hand and proceeded to the dance floor. The song was a slow tempo. You looked into his eyes, which he did with as well. “Who are you?” he asked. You smiled but didn’t answer his question. “You look good wearing that mask, mi lady.” You smiled, “Thank you.” He goes near your ear and whispered, “But you will look better if you’re in bed with me.” You smirked, “We’ll see then.” You don’t know why you answered that but maybe it’s the alcohol talking. The two of you were about to leave the venue when the electricity were cut off. “Shit.” you said. “Wait here, mi lady.” Steve told you.

Once Steve leaves, you put in your in-ear and talked to Tony, “what’s happening?” you asked. “I need you to leave, y/n. I won’t risk you getting hurt here if something bad is gonna happen.” Tony replied. “You’re training me to be on your team, Stark. I won’t leave this goddamn place.” you answered. “It’s funny you call me Stark, but you are one, too.” Tony teased. “Oh shut up, oldie.” you said. “FRIDAY, give me something. heat signatures, anything.” you said. “Heat signatures on the podium, Miss y/n. Looks like someone is being held hostage.” FRIDAY replied. you thanked the AI afterwards.

The electricity went back on and you saw Rumlow, holding Pepper hostage. You looked at Tony, who has a gun aimed at him by Rollins. Looking at the other Avengers, they were being cautious on their moves, to not hurt any civilians or their own. “Leave Pepper alone, Rumlow. If you want me, take me instead.” Tony said. Dumbass you said to yourself. “Oh I don’t want you, Mr. Stark. You know who I want.” Rumlow said, sending chills down your spine. It’s you who they want. It’s sole reason why Tony is making you train to be one of the Avengers, for you to be safe. “She’s not here.” Tony replied. “Is she now? Your sister will miss one of your grandest parties?” Rumlow scoffed. Eyes locked on Rumlow, you walked slowly behind the scared people, trying not to make any noise with your high heeled shoes.

You aimed your pistol on Rumlow’s head, calculating, making sure not to hit Pepper and put her in danger, before hitting fire, Rumlow’s blood slowly dripped down on Pepper’s shoulders, making her shriek and ran to Happy. “Push that trigger and I swear to God, i’ll blow your brains out just like your friend here.” You said to Rollins, aiming your gun to him, making him look at you. Rollins smirked, you saw him push the trigger slowly, but even before he could fully pull the trigger, you shot his hand making him drop his gun and wince in pain. You ran towards a nearby table and jumped on Rollins, making your thighs wrapped around his neck, struggling, Rollins tried to get a knife on his pocket but couldn’t. You used gravity and the force of your body to bring him to the ground.

The guy tried to break free from your hold, and succeeded, tossing you to the side. Rollins grabbed the gun you left on the ground, and aimed it towards Tony again. You tapped your makeshift watch that your brother gave you, and it turned into a Ironman-glove, you zapped Rollins with a stun-burst before he can pull the trigger on Tony. You rushed towards him, firing again. Rollins ducks the blast then trades blows with you, firing the gun. You had the glove on the barrel, blocking the bullet. You pull the gun barrel loose then Rollins smacks you backwards, making your mask fall to the ground. Tony fired his reactor towards Rollins, making the latter bounce off and pass out.

You looked at Tony, “You could’ve done that awhile ago.” you said to him. The other Avengers looked at you, stunned. “What the hell just happened?” Sam asked the others. “How- how did she managed to do all those?” Wanda asked the others as well. You walked towards them and smiled. “Let’s all talk later. But first, let’s get back to the tower, I’m fucking tired from all these shits.” You said. Steve looked at you and you winked at him.

“I saw that.” Tony said, you smiled. “You see everything, Tony. But not this Rumlow attack though.” You said and laugh. Tony looked at you with disbelief. “You little rascal, get back here!” Tony said following you behind.

Once all of you got back to the tower, you explained everything. “That’s basically it.” you said and sat on the conference table. “So, Rumlow got obsessed with you and he was planning to kidnap you?” Steve repeated what you said, to which you nodded in reply. “Well, not gonna lie here, y/n is obviously very pretty and smart. Kind too.” Sam said, making you smile. “Thank you, Sam.” you replied. “And you’re only telling this to us, just now, when he already attacked us and caught all of us off guard?” Natasha said. “Yeah. I could’ve told you guys beforehand but didn’t. I did great though, can’t deny that.” You replied. Steve sighed, “Let’s all call it a night. Tony, we need to talk.” he said, making you look at Tony, your eyebrows furrowed. Tony just shrugged back at you.

It was around 1 in the morning, when your stomach grumbled. “Why am I even hungry?” you asked yourself. You went down to the kitchen to get something to munch on, when you someone behind you cleared his throat. “Yes Steve, what is it?” you asked, not looking at him. He sighed, “You could’ve died in there.” Steve said. “But I didn’t, so-” “Stop with that attitude of yours, y/n.” you looked at him and said, “Make me.” Steve smirked at you, walking towards you, “Oh I will.” he said before crashing his lips with yours.

MASTERLIST

You were in the car, listening to some Christmas songs. You’re on your way to this Christmas Masquerade Ball that your brother, Tony Stark, is holding. You opened your purse and got a mirror, you looked at yourself and smiled, satisfied on how you looked for tonight. “Ms. y/n, we’re here.” Your driver said. “Thank you, Happy.” You smiled and went out of the car. You got inside the venue, looked around and saw how beautifully the place is decorated. “Impressive. This is such a Tony Stark move.” You said and giggled. Tony had rented out a bigger venue for the ball as you quote him, “The tower can’t accommodate all your fancy gowns.”

“Indeed, it is a Tony Stark move.” A random guy wearing a red mask contrasting his blonde hair said. You laughed, and so does the guy. “I’ll see you around, Ms. Black Mask.” The guy said leaving you alone. “And you thought I  wouldn’t notice you, Steve Rogers.” you said to yourself. You walked around, and saw familiar faces. “Boo!” a white masked lady is now beside you. “Stop it, Nat. I know it’s you.” You said to your bestfriend. “God, I thought you wouldn’t even recognize me. I hate you.” Natasha said. “Well, I couldn’t miss the red hair so-” You trailed.

An hour had passed and Steve is still ringing in your head. “Why does he look so fucking good all the time?” you blurt out, sipping in your drink. “Who?” Wanda asked returning on your table. You were startled, “What? It’s nothing.” But knowing your bestfriends, they know very well you’re lying. they looked at you suspiciously. “Fine, fine! I’ll spill!” Natasha and Wanda giggled. “Who is it? We might know him.” “Awhile ago, when I arrived here, a random guy with a red mask talked to me. I was talking to myself but I guess my voice was kind of loud that he heard it and made a small conversation with me.” You said. “Hmm.. is it that guy?” Natasha pointed at your back and saw Steve, talking to Bucky, Sam and Clint. “Unfortunately, it is.” you asked. Wanda smiled. “You’re still into him huh.” Natasha eyed you, “Well, couldn’t really get him out of my mind that easily.” You replied.

“Go after him.” Natasha said. “What? No! Why would I? I told myself I’ll leave him be.” You replied. “y/n, you’re obviously so into him still, and he’s probably too.” Wanda said. “PROBABLY, we’re not sure about it. And besides, he’s got company.” You said, eyeing Steve and a person you recognize easily, Sharon.

“Hello there, ladies.” Tony said walking towards you three. You smiled at Pepper and gave her a hug. “How are you? I haven’t seen you in awhile.” Pepper said to you, which made you sigh. “Well, you can ask my brother to why you haven’t seen me in days.” You replied looking at your brother. “She’s busy. Very busy.” Tony winked at you. Tony and you have agreed on you training to be in the Avengers, but is keeping it a secret for the meantime, as you both don’t know how things will work out once you announce it to them.

It’s that part of the event that everyone’s on their feet and on the dance floor. You were so bored that you went to the bar inside the hotel that the event’s taking place and ordered a drink. “God, can this event finish already? I’m tired.” You said, making the bartender laugh. You were having your second drink when a guy went up to you, “May I have this dance, mi lady?” you looked at him and saw that it was Steve, you smiled. “You’re seriously asking me to dance with you?” he nodded and smiled, taking his hand out for you to reach. You held his hand and proceeded to the dance floor. The song was a slow tempo. You looked into his eyes, which he did with as well. “Who are you?” he asked. You smiled but didn’t answer his question. “You look good wearing that mask, mi lady.” You smiled, “Thank you.” He goes near your ear and whispered, “But you will look better if you’re in bed with me.” You smirked, “We’ll see then.” You don’t know why you answered that but maybe it’s the alcohol talking. The two of you were about to leave the venue when the electricity were cut off. “Shit.” you said. “Wait here, mi lady.” Steve told you.

Once Steve leaves, you put in your in-ear and talked to Tony, “what’s happening?” you asked. “I need you to leave, y/n. I won’t risk you getting hurt here if something bad is gonna happen.” Tony replied. “You’re training me to be on your team, Stark. I won’t leave this goddamn place.” you answered. “It’s funny you call me Stark, but you are one, too.” Tony teased. “Oh shut up, oldie.” you said. “FRIDAY, give me something. heat signatures, anything.” you said. “Heat signatures on the podium, Miss y/n. Looks like someone is being held hostage.” FRIDAY replied. you thanked the AI afterwards.

The electricity went back on and you saw Rumlow, holding Pepper hostage. You looked at Tony, who has a gun aimed at him by Rollins. Looking at the other Avengers, they were being cautious on their moves, to not hurt any civilians or their own. “Leave Pepper alone, Rumlow. If you want me, take me instead.” Tony said. Dumbass you said to yourself. “Oh I don’t want you, Mr. Stark. You know who I want.” Rumlow said, sending chills down your spine. It’s you who they want. It’s sole reason why Tony is making you train to be one of the Avengers, for you to be safe. “She’s not here.” Tony replied. “Is she now? Your sister will miss one of your grandest parties?” Rumlow scoffed. Eyes locked on Rumlow, you walked slowly behind the scared people, trying not to make any noise with your high heeled shoes.

You aimed your pistol on Rumlow’s head, calculating, making sure not to hit Pepper and put her in danger, before hitting fire, Rumlow’s blood slowly dripped down on Pepper’s shoulders, making her shriek and ran to Happy. “Push that trigger and I swear to God, i’ll blow your brains out just like your friend here.” You said to Rollins, aiming your gun to him, making him look at you. Rollins smirked, you saw him push the trigger slowly, but even before he could fully pull the trigger, you shot his hand making him drop his gun and wince in pain. You ran towards a nearby table and jumped on Rollins, making your thighs wrapped around his neck, struggling, Rollins tried to get a knife on his pocket but couldn’t. You used gravity and the force of your body to bring him to the ground.

The guy tried to break free from your hold, and succeeded, tossing you to the side. Rollins grabbed the gun you left on the ground, and aimed it towards Tony again. You tapped your makeshift watch that your brother gave you, and it turned into a Ironman-glove, you zapped Rollins with a stun-burst before he can pull the trigger on Tony. You rushed towards him, firing again. Rollins ducks the blast then trades blows with you, firing the gun. You had the glove on the barrel, blocking the bullet. You pull the gun barrel loose then Rollins smacks you backwards, making your mask fall to the ground. Tony fired his reactor towards Rollins, making the latter bounce off and pass out.

You looked at Tony, “You could’ve done that awhile ago.” you said to him. The other Avengers looked at you, stunned. “What the hell just happened?” Sam asked the others. “How- how did she managed to do all those?” Wanda asked the others as well. You walked towards them and smiled. “Let’s all talk later. But first, let’s get back to the tower, I’m fucking tired from all these shits.” You said. Steve looked at you and you winked at him.

“I saw that.” Tony said, you smiled. “You see everything, Tony. But not this Rumlow attack though.” You said and laugh. Tony looked at you with disbelief. “You little rascal, get back here!” Tony said following you behind.

Once all of you got back to the tower, you explained everything. “That’s basically it.” you said and sat on the conference table. “So, Rumlow got obsessed with you and he was planning to kidnap you?” Steve repeated what you said, to which you nodded in reply. “Well, not gonna lie here, y/n is obviously very pretty and smart. Kind too.” Sam said, making you smile. “Thank you, Sam.” you replied. “And you’re only telling this to us, just now, when he already attacked us and caught all of us off guard?” Natasha said. “Yeah. I could’ve told you guys beforehand but didn’t. I did great though, can’t deny that.” You replied. Steve sighed, “Let’s all call it a night. Tony, we need to talk.” he said, making you look at Tony, your eyebrows furrowed. Tony just shrugged back at you.

It was around 1 in the morning, when your stomach grumbled. “Why am I even hungry?” you asked yourself. You went down to the kitchen to get something to munch on, when you someone behind you cleared his throat. “Yes Steve, what is it?” you asked, not looking at him. He sighed, “You could’ve died in there.” Steve said. “But I didn’t, so-” “Stop with that attitude of yours, y/n.” you looked at him and said, “Make me.” Steve smirked at you, walking towards you, “Oh I will.” he said before crashing his lips with yours.
trail.content_abstract:
Title: BLACK MASK / Steve Rogers x Reader (can be Avengers x Reader)

Summary: Your brother, Tony Stark, arranged a Christmas Masquerade Ball, but things turn upside down.

Pairing: Steve Roger x Female Stark!Reader | Avengers x Reader

Warnings: fighting, violence, blood, implied smut.

Word Count: roughly 1.6k.

Author’s Note: This is my first time writing a fight scene so… Please do comment, ask, or anything regarding this, I do appreciate constructive criticisms as I don’t usually write fics often. I haven’t proofread this yet. I’m sorry.

MASTERLIST

summary: Avengers: Endgame directors confirm what happened to Loki
title: Avengers: Endgame directors confirm what happened to Loki
description:
Despite his death at the start of Avengers: Infinity War, Loki reappeared in Endgame as part of the team’s time heist.

When Tony Stark, Scott Lang, Steve Rogers and Bruce Banner/Hulk travel back to the battle of New York in 2012, their interference means that the then-alive Loki is able to escape with the Space Stone.

Directors the Russo brothers have now explained what happened to the God of Mischief, admitting that Captain America’s intent to correct timelines gets a bit complicated.

“The intent was that he was going to correct the past timelines at the point that the stones left,” Joe Russo told Business Insider.

“Loki, when he teleports away with the Time Stone, would create his own timeline. It gets very complicated, but it would be impossible for [Cap] to rectify the timeline unless he found Loki.

"The minute that Loki does something as dramatic as take the Space Stone, he creates a branched reality.”

Anthony Russo added: “We’re dealing with this idea of multiverses and branched realities, so there are many realities.”

It all ties in to that Captain America timeline problem too, with Joe explaining: “So he would have to come back to this timeline in order to hand off the shield.”

“There’s a question of, how did this separate timeline Cap come to reappear in this timeline and why?” Anthony added – although the directors admitted that was a story for another day.

Still, it seems that the “branched reality” Loki may be the one that we see in his own upcoming standalone Disney+ TV series.

When Tony Stark, Scott Lang, Steve Rogers and Bruce Banner/Hulk travel back to the battle of New York in 2012, their interference means that the then-alive Loki is able to escape with the Space Stone.

Directors the Russo brothers have now explained what happened to the God of Mischief, admitting that Captain America’s intent to correct timelines gets a bit complicated.

“The intent was that he was going to correct the past timelines at the point that the stones left,” Joe Russo told Business Insider.

“Loki, when he teleports away with the Time Stone, would create his own timeline. It gets very complicated, but it would be impossible for [Cap] to rectify the timeline unless he found Loki.

"The minute that Loki does something as dramatic as take the Space Stone, he creates a branched reality.”

Anthony Russo added: “We’re dealing with this idea of multiverses and branched realities, so there are many realities.”

It all ties in to that Captain America timeline problem too, with Joe explaining: “So he would have to come back to this timeline in order to hand off the shield.”

trail.content:
Despite his death at the start of Avengers: Infinity War, Loki reappeared in Endgame as part of the team’s time heist.

When Tony Stark, Scott Lang, Steve Rogers and Bruce Banner/Hulk travel back to the battle of New York in 2012, their interference means that the then-alive Loki is able to escape with the Space Stone.

Directors the Russo brothers have now explained what happened to the God of Mischief, admitting that Captain America’s intent to correct timelines gets a bit complicated.

“The intent was that he was going to correct the past timelines at the point that the stones left,” Joe Russo told Business Insider.

“Loki, when he teleports away with the Time Stone, would create his own timeline. It gets very complicated, but it would be impossible for [Cap] to rectify the timeline unless he found Loki.

"The minute that Loki does something as dramatic as take the Space Stone, he creates a branched reality.”

Anthony Russo added: “We’re dealing with this idea of multiverses and branched realities, so there are many realities.”

It all ties in to that Captain America timeline problem too, with Joe explaining: “So he would have to come back to this timeline in order to hand off the shield.”

“There’s a question of, how did this separate timeline Cap come to reappear in this timeline and why?” Anthony added – although the directors admitted that was a story for another day.

Still, it seems that the “branched reality” Loki may be the one that we see in his own upcoming standalone Disney+ TV series.
